name: Cutting Edge VR
description:
You have two guns that both fires a sharp blade in the direction of your aim. With them you will slice down every cube that flies towards you. You have unlimited ammo and minimal reload time which makes it easy to fire away! However, some cubes are different from the rest, meaning that you not only have to focus on which gun to fire with, but also the angle you hit the cubes with.

Should work for all major VR headsets, but has only been tested for Oculus Rift S.

  • Joysticks: Control the angle of your aim
  • A-Button: Activate slowmotion attack
  • B-Button: Pause game
